title: Season 2016 NA end? Timer or Local?
body: So I'm EST time zone and my ranked season would end in 7 and a half hours? or is all North America based on this timer? https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/230496748

replies.body:
Regardless of where you are, the ranked season ends at **23:59 Pacific Standard Time**, which is what the countdown timer shows.

Let me know if you have any other questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=d9lhBh3E,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-11-07T22:57:30.957+0000)
>
> Regardless of where you are, the ranked season ends at **23:59 Pacific Standard Time**, which is what the countdown timer shows.
> 
> Let me know if you have any other questions.

Thank you so much! I'm going to make my goal :D
